definition: screenshot/to capture an image displayed on a computer screen
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: That particular screenshot mentioned shows off a visceral fight between Marauders and Immortals.
sentences.chinese: 这张截屏展示了掠夺者和不朽者的激烈战斗。

sentences.english: This screen shot shows the Green Dam content filtering software distributed in China.
sentences.chinese: 这个截屏显示了在中国推广的绿坝内容过滤软件。

sentences.english: This screen shot shows you what the small application looks like on your desktop.
sentences.chinese: 这个截屏可以看到这个小软件在你桌面的样子。

sentences.english: Here is a screenshot of sets defined for the product dimension of my example model.
sentences.chinese: 这里是我示例模型的产品维度定义的集合截屏。

sentences.english: Many of the screenshots in this article were taken using these example projects.
sentences.chinese: 本文中的许多截屏都来自这些例子项目。

sentences.english: In the screenshots above, you see two popups that users have been seeing in recent days.
sentences.chinese: 上述截屏就是两家用户最近收到的两条弹出消息。

sentences.english: Here is a screenshot I captured from "The Simpsons" TV series.
sentences.chinese: 这个图是从“辛普森一族”里截屏出来的。

sentences.english: It also helps bloggers like me to take better screenshots.
sentences.chinese: 它同时让像我这样的博客作者进行很好的网页截屏。

sentences.english: Check out the screen shots below.
The lack of some simple features, like the ability to take screenshots, is also annoying.
sentences.chinese: 一些基本功能的却是很恼人，比如截屏。

sentences.english: There were screenshots given to the press but it is highly possible that these were actually mock-ups.
sentences.chinese: 媒体拿到了一些截屏，但是很可能这些都是伪造的。

sentences.english: Ever wanted to know how to get great screenshots from your iPhone?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经想过如何从你iphone上截屏吗？

definition: to cut off a section of sth
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
